rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}

unitName: Placement research project for honours in international studies
description: This unit provides the student with an opportunity toa. Undertake a practical work placement with an NGO, community organization or other agency working on local and/or international issues of about eighty hours resulting in a substantial research report or other piece of written work; orb. Undertake a case study analysis for an NGO or community organization on an issue or problem of importance and relevance to that organisation.In both cases a supervisor will meet regularly with the student to ensure that a carefully structured reading and writing program is developed in a manner directly relevant to the research topic.
